attributes.action: Stop allowing Train Companies to increase Rail fares
attributes.additional_details:
This cost isn't sustainable, something has to give. 

It's time for the Government to cap the price rises. 

It's about time we start paying a reasonable price for the shocking train system that we have.

In 2016/17, 7.2 million passengers experienced delays of at least 30 minutes.
There have been games created making fun of the shoddy service people experience. 
This is simply not good enough.
attributes.background:
The way the rail companies constantly increase rail fares when the service is ridiculously poor is not acceptable.

The BBC today have reported that commuters are spending up to a 5th of their take home pay on their season ticket.


https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-england-45174496
